author: andschwa
body: Per dotnet/cli#2493, we now have build warnings.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors FYI I'm just waiting for _everyone_ to have updated .NET CLI, as this is a breaking change and I want to minimize headaches (already ran into this exact problem with @johnkord this morning).

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
@chunqingchen @raghushantha @daxian-dbw @mirichmo are working on adding new dlls.
I think they should use new schema for new project.json.
Should we upgrade to the new json schema for 0.6.0 ?

`Start-PSBootstrap` is pretty convenient for cli upgrade.

title: Update project.json files for new CLI release
